replies.body: Good luck to all of you summoners out there, hope you have great games!
You too :)
in b4 toxic afk feeders in the first 10 games demoting everyone down to bronze
As the big guy {{champion:48}}  would say "Time to Troll"

And like I would say: Time To Report!   








(jks)
Reporting trolls is no joking matter friends; if you don't do it, they'll just keep ruining games.
Good thing we have a tribunal to stop them aye {{item:3151}} {{item:2049}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
If it be norms, no stuffs given. Ranked is different matter. No trolling {{champion:17}} 's or jg {{champion:4}} 's.
jg tf is like legit
Just need a tribunal now -.-
Going for bronze 4 wish me luck!
Played first game, got a troll who said  "its more fun to troll than play". They then fed the other team resulting in a loss.
Had a {{champion:17}} Trolling hard 29 deaths during a game and still won.
WOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOT! GOODLUCK EVERYONE!

Won 9/10 Games here's my scores:

Game 1: 20/7/13 - WIN
Game 2: 5/10/5 - LOSS
Game 3: 5/1/31 - WIN
Game 4: 13/4/10 - WIN
Game 5: 15/3/4 - WIN
Game 6: 17/5/6 - WIN
Game 7: 11/5/5 - WIN
Game 8: 26/8/3 - WIN
Game 9: 8/2/7 - WIN
Game 10: 6/2/4 - WIN

Got Bronze 3
I know the pain, 4/10 and dropped a whole division </3 {{item:3070}}
just joined my first game, thus my client lagged and wouldn't let me pick, it then proceeded to kick me out and use one my first provisional, THANKS RITO NOTHING TO DO WITH MY CONNECTION
who is that girl in the green suit in the picture?
more like dragonslayer {{champion:67}} ...shes green
Vayne
ah man, first ranked game back and i already get matched with someone named AlucardXXX who afk's mid game -.- glhf with provisionals
3 games in to my provisionals lossed every one ;~; i dont want to continue i....i....just cant.

Honestly i know how you feel but just waiting to see if trolls would get offline is just not needed. But if you do believe that trolls are online or that you lost because you think are unskilled then its ok. You can just wait for the kids who have to go to bed at night so you have a less chance of little kid ragers and trolls cause they are humans 2 they need sleep. Also if you think you are unskilled dont be scared making mistakes is the first step to progress by knowing  what you did wrong and learn from it. If you face against people who are beating you in lane think of what they are thinking/doing and see what you did that was a mistake so you can improve and make it a habit. Just trying to help people out to not be scared of ranked and dont think of ELO HELL!!! It doesnt exist IMO.
hope i get no trolls
Good luck everyone, may the odds be in your favour :)
i was silver 4 and i won 6 games    how the fck i get fucking Brozn 2!!!!!  what!!!!the!!!!!!fuckkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkk!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
same here but i got bronze 4...
OMG RIOT I AM SO MAD...... i've played 0/10 of my games and won 0 and i'm in unranked!!!!!{{item:3070}}{{item:3070}}{{item:3070}} this is what majority of players are whining about.
i need team for rank :D be friends with me plz
I dont get it, shouldnt you place the same, or higher no matter what? What a waste of time and effort;/ Why does there even have to be a reset? fml, here we go again.{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

It's the same concept as "New year, new me" except that you actually change easily. People that are "stuck in elohell" have the chance to get out if they are good enough, or continue to be "stuck" if they aren't good enough.
not true, i just won 4 out of 10 and got bronze 5.. like wtf

If you had participated in the previous season, your seeding in your provisional games will be roughly around the same elo/mmr. 

If you are previously unranked, your seeding in your provisional games will assume you are silver.

Dont you think its unfair to get reported and banned for leaving a game where a singed went adc with smite and stole all my buffs when going jungle?
Rito pls
** riot why haven't i gotten why boarder yet?**
I WON 8/10 GAMES AND GOT IN B2 CMON RIOT THATS AT LEAST A SILVER 5
{{champion:103}} {{champion:12}}
I just won 4 out of 10 games and carried them all and got bronze 5.. Why?
http://gyazo.com/2f4bcb0ad35ef971cd198682ec48d78e didn't know they did this, pretty stupid imo. Changed the map, jungle camps and buffs from drag and baron, so what? Stupid.
Gotta love winning 6/10 and getting demoted to s4... took me ages to get out of that garbage.
Thanks Rito Gold III 7-3
good luck all c:
Btw all the matches I won, I either played support and fed my adc, or i played other lanes and got fed, the ones i lost i still did good but got let down by my team...
As far as I know it's all about what rank you were last season, as I was unranked and won 6/10 and got silver three while my friend was bronze 5 last season and won 7/10 and is still bronze 5 :P
